medical_history.chief_complaint: Periumbilical pain with sharpness in the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient started to have pain yesterday in the afternoon, initially dull in quality, which progressed to sharpness in the right lower quadrant. She has begun to experience chills, nausea, and decreased appetite but denies fever, chills, night sweats, vomiting, diarrhea, sick contacts, or changes in diet.
medical_history.family_history: CAD (grandparents deaths), maternal grandmother with breast cancer at 76, paternal grandmother with ovarian cancer, paternal grandfather with DVT, both parents with hypertension, and alcohol abuse on the father's side.
